rooms.description: Wide entrance area with step-free access and ramp for wheelchair accessibility. Decorated in Chettinad style with intricate carvings and traditional motifs.
Spacious living room opening to the central courtyard, ensuring natural light and ventilation. Features wide doorways for accessibility.
Adjacent to the living area with open concept design; features adjustable seating and accessible layout. Chettinad motifs integrated.
Modern kitchen designed in a split-level style with accessibility modifications; includes low countertops and wheelchair-accessible appliances.
One of the bedrooms on ground floor for easy access. Includes ensuite bathroom accessible design.
Spacious master bedroom designed with privacy and accessibility features; adjoining en-suite bathroom is wheelchair-friendly.
Accessible utility area for storage and appliances. Includes ramped entry as required by accessibility guidelines.

openings.description: Wheelchair accessible entrance with automatic door mechanism.
Open access to the central courtyard promoting natural ventilation and light, compliant with Vastu for south-east direction.
Provides additional space overlooking the garden. Designed with accessible handrails.
